articles.title: Mapping Burns and Natural Reforestation using Thematic Mapper Data
articles.authors: Lopez Garcia, M., and V. Caselles
articles.your_summary: The city of Valencia Spain has a high risk of fires because of its Mediterranean weather and it is crucial to use remote sensing in these areas. I like how the authors used analysis of spectral signatures because it shows unique patterns of wavelenghts over time around the burnt areas of Valencia.

your_summary.title: Landscape Assessment: Remote Sensing of Severity, the Normalized Burn Ratio; and Ground Measure of Severity, the Composite Burn Index.
your_summary.authors: Key, C. and N. Benson, N
your_summary.your_summary: This article talks about wildfire damage and its severity by using Composite Burn Index. This involves looking a different levels of damages to trees and soils Another remote sensing method that was used was Normalized Burn Ratio and that uses satellite imagery to measure fires.
